PKCS11Key
========

The pkcs11key package implements a crypto.Signer interface for a PKCS#11 private key.

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/letsencrypt/pkcs11key.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/letsencrypt/pkcs11key)
